metadata.synopsis: Generic. A brave NPC sees a player shapeshifted into a scary form (wolf, bear, badger, spider, ...) or a scary summon (spider, fire elemenal, ...), and tries to herd it away. Stout NPCs (GUARD, BADASSCIVILIAN, NOT_MESSING_AROUND)
